meanings.sent1: She nervously bit her underlip while waiting for the results.
meanings.sent2: His underlip quivered as he tried to hold back his tears.
meanings.sent3: The underlip of the cup was chipped, making it look like it had a tiny smile.
meanings.sent4: Her underlip trembled like a leaf in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The underlip of the cliff jutted out menacingly, daring anyone to approach.

meanings.definition: The lower part of the mouth.
meanings.sent1: He wiped the crumbs from his underlip after eating the cookie.
meanings.sent2: The baby drooled from his underlip while teething.
meanings.sent3: The underlip of the riverbank was covered in mud from the recent rain.
meanings.sent4: Her underlip was as red as a ripe cherry.
meanings.sent5: The underlip of the cave was dark and foreboding, hiding its secrets within.
